title: Common Record Metadata
description: Defines a base set of attributes for provenance, security, and record control.

sourceCode.description: The system or source from which the data record originated (e.g., HR, CRM, DMV).

sourceId.description: The unique identifier of the record within the source system.

dateReceived.description: Timestamp when the record was ingested into the EMS.

securityMarkings.description: Security classification or markings applied to the record (e.g., 'CONFIDENTIAL', 'SECRET').
